name: Worldwide Mix of Sports Online Trivia | Wide World of Sports | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many franchises were part of the Indian Premier League in 2009?
questions.explanation:
8.

	The eight franchises included 3 in the North, 3 in the South, and one each in the East and West of India.

questions.text: In the 2008 FIFA Club World Cup, Wayne Rooney won the Golden Ball and his teammate Cristiano Ronaldo won the Silver Ball.  Who won the Bronze Ball?
questions.explanation:
Damian Manso.

	Damian Manso was a midfielder and a member of the LDU Quito squad during this tournament.

questions.text: In official dart competition, how many points is the inner bullseye worth?
questions.explanation:
50.

	The outer bullseye is worth 25, while the actual inner bullseye is worth 50.

questions.text:
Who were the winners of the 2009 Australian Open Men's and 
Women's singles?
questions.explanation:
Rafael Nadal / Serena Williams.

	Rafael Nadal won in five sets after playing a five-hour match.  Serena Williams won her final in 59 minutes, 6-0 and 6-3.

questions.text: How many times did Spanish soccer star Raul Gonzalez win the Champions League title with Real Madrid?
questions.explanation:
3.

	He won 3 UEFA Champions League titles with Real Madrid: 1997-98, 1999-00, and 2001-02. He left as the top scorer of the Champions League with 64 goals. He also won 6 Liga titles, 4 Spanish Super Cups, 1 UEFA Super Cup, and 2 Intercontinental Super Cups while with Real Madrid.

questions.text: In 2008, Novak Djokovic won the Australian Open.  This was his _______ Grand Slam win.
questions.explanation:
1st.

	Novak Djokovic won the 2008 Australian Open defeating Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in 4 sets in the final.  This was his first Grand Slam win.

questions.text: Which franchise won the inaugural edition of the Indian Premier League in 2008?
questions.explanation:
Rajasthan Royals.

	Rajasthan Royals defeated the Chennai Super Kings in the final by three wickets.

questions.text: Which of the following football grounds is based in England?
questions.explanation:
Sincil Bank.

	Sincil Bank is home to Lincoln City.  Merthyr Tydfil play their home games at Penydarren Park.  Easter Road plays home to Hibernian, and Spytty Park is Newport County's home.

questions.text: Which team's football stadium is named Bloomfield Road?
questions.explanation:
Blackpool.

	Blackpool played at Bloomfield Road beginning in 1899.  They played at Raikes Hall Gardens and the Athletic Grounds prior to Bloomfield.

questions.text: Who won the Australian Open in 2000?
questions.explanation:
Andre Agassi.

	Agassi defeated Kafelnikov in 4 sets in the final.
